label: Strike of bedding
definition: Geographic azimuth (relative to true north) at a point observation location, of a horizontal line contained in a sedimentary rock bedding surface. The bedding surface must not be horizontal; the azimuth is reported such that the dip direction of the inclined bedding is to the right when facing in the azimuth direction.
comment: line of intersection, sedimentary rock, azimuth, bedding plane, horizontal plane, ADD: interpretation: angle measured with the dip direction to the right

hasConstraint.label: angle measured with the dip direction to the right when facing in the azimuth direction
